       [ngClass]="{'timepicker-dial__item_active': isActive, 'timepicker-dial__control_editable': isEditable}"

       (blur)="formatTime()" [readonly]="!isEditable" [timepickerAutofocus]="isActive" (keydown)="onKeyDown($event)">
